PHP Debug                  -> felixfbecker.php-debug              -> depends on php-xdebug
php cs fixer               -> junstyle.php-cs-fixer               -> depends on php-cs-fixer (friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer)
phpcs                      -> ikappas.phpcs                       -> depends on php-CodeSniffer
PHP Intelephense           -> bmewburn.vscode-intelephense-client
GitLens - Git supercharged -> eamodio.gitlens
Todo Tree                  -> gruntfuggly.todo-tree
Live Share                 -> ms-vsliveshare.vsliveshare
Beautify                   -> hookyqr.beautify
Duplicate action           -> mrmlnc.vscode-duplicate
Toggle Quotes              -> britesnow.vscode-toggle-quotes
Spell Right                -> ban.spellright (https://github.com/titoBouzout/Dictionaries -> ~/.config/Code/Dictionaries/)
